text.autoconfig.sfcr.title: SuperFancyClouds: Refabricated
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.enableServer:
When enabled, your sampler / height / density etc.
will synchronized with server if you connect to
a server which installed SFCR.
Height of the cloud on the Y-axis. May NOT accurate.
It will invalid when other mod which 
modify cloud height are installed (such as Sodium-Extra).
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.cloudBlockSi:
Define how big a cloud block is. 
Measure in block.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.cloudLayerTh:
Measure in cloud block.
§4May impact performance if set too high§r
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.cloudRenderD:
Measure in cloud block.
Ignored when "Fit to View" is enabled.
§4May impact performance if set too high§r
Cloud Render Distance Fit to View
"Cloud Render Distance" will be ignore when enabled.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.cloudRefresh: Control speed of cloud normal refresh speed.
Control how many steps that Cloud-Sampler will use.
High value make clouds more realistic,
but will reduce performance (and amount).
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.enableTerrai:
Cloud block will no appears in higher mountains or buildings if enabled.
Reducing cloud block size can improve detection accuracy.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.debug.@Toolt: Do §4NOT§r enable it unless you're tester.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.enableFog.@T: Use fog to transition cloud to view boundary.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.fogAutoDista:
Fog distance will auto adjust depends on view distance.
"Fog Distance" Value will be ignored.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.fogMinDistan:
The distance from fog to player. Higher and farther.
Will swap each other if bigger than END.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.fogMaxDistan:
The distance from fog to player. Higher and farther.
Will swap each other if smaller than START.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.enableWeathe: Let the clouds density change with current weather.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.weatherPreDe:
When the weather is about to change,
how many seconds in advance to change the cloud.
Set 0 to disable.
Will automatic disable if you aren't host in multiplayer.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.cloudDensity: Cloud Density Settings: Set cloud density in different scenes
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.weatherRefre:
Control the refresh rate of clouds when
weather changes. The faster refresh rate,
the smoother density change.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.densityChang:
Higher speed will make the density
change incoherently.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.biomeDensity:
Detemine the influence of biome precipitation
factor on cloud density. Base on "Common Density".
When set to 100, clouds will not appear
in some biome like desert.
Set to 0 will disable biome detect function.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.isBiomeDensi:
Biome detect use chunk beneath cloud
instead of player's position.

"Detect From Chunk" needs enabled.
Distant cloud which no chunk beneath it
will try to detect loaded chunk nearby player
instead of use sample data.
Biome in this list will not affect cloud density.
Format: §omodid:biomeid§r or §o#modid:biometag§r
